effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   Experience is split across two groups: Pokémon who participated in battle, and Pokémon holding this item.  Each Pokémon earns experience as though it had battled alone, divided by the number of Pokémon in its group, then divided by the number of groups. Pokémon holding this item who also participated in battle effectively earn experience twice.

    Fainted Pokémon never earn experience, and empty groups are
ignored; thus, if a single Pokémon is holding this item and the only Pokémon who battled faints from explosion, the holder will gain full experience.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Half the experience from a battle is split between Pokémon holding this item.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A hold item that
gets EXP. points
from battles.

A hold item that
gets EXP. points
from battles.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
The holder gets a share of EXP.
points without having to battle.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The holder gets a share of a battle’s
Exp. Points without battling.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The holder gets a share of a battle’s
Exp. Points without battling.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The holder gets a share of a battle’s
Exp. Points without battling.

Objet à tenir. Le porteur reçoit une
partie des points Exp. du combat sans
avoir à combattre.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The holder gets a share of a battle’s
Exp. Points without battling.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
The holder gets a share of a battle’s
Exp. Points without battling.

スイッチを　いれると
てもちの　ポケモン　すべてが
けいけんちを　もらえる　そうち。

스위치를 켜면
지닌 포켓몬 모두가
경험치를 받을 수 있는 장치.

Objet à activer. Permet de faire gagner des
Points Exp. à tous les Pokémon de l’équipe,
même à ceux qui n’ont pas participé au combat.

Solange der EP-Teiler angeschaltet ist, erhält
jedes Team-Pokémon nach einem Sieg
Erfahrungspunkte.

Película metálica que fortalece los ataques de
tipo Acero. Debe llevarlo un Pokémon.

Se attivato, tutti i Pokémon della squadra
ricevono Punti Esperienza dalla lotta anche
se non vi hanno partecipato.

Turning on this special device will
allow all the Pokémon on your team
to receive Exp. Points from battles.

スイッチを　いれると
手持ちの　ポケモン　すべてが
経験値を　もらえる　装置。

スイッチを　いれると
てもちの　ポケモン　すべてが
けいけんちを　もらえる　そうち。

스위치를 켜면
지닌 포켓몬 모두가
경험치를 받을 수 있는 장치.

打開開關後，
同行的所有寶可夢
都可獲得經驗值的裝置。

Objet à activer. Permet de faire gagner des
Points Exp. à tous les Pokémon de l’équipe,
même à ceux qui n’ont pas participé au combat.

Solange der EP-Teiler angeschaltet ist, erhält jedes
Team-Pokémon nach einem Sieg Erfahrungspunkte.

Al activar el dispositivo, todos los Pokémon de
tu equipo ganan Puntos de Experiencia tras los
combates, aunque no salgan a luchar.

Se attivato, tutti i Pokémon della squadra ricevono
Punti Esperienza dalla lotta anche se non vi hanno
partecipato.

Turning on this special device will allow all the
Pokémon on your team to receive Exp. Points
from battles.

スイッチを　いれると
手持ちの　ポケモン　すべてが
経験値を　もらえる　装置。

打开开关后，
能让同行的所有宝可梦
获得经验值的装置。
